posts.message: Has a good explanation about handling date & time formats across different locals and browsers. Apparently data & time handling is an old but ongoing topic :)

posts.description: In the realm of software development, time and date manipulation is considered by many to be a difficult task. posts.message:
Hi there,
I'm beginning to learn Prolog programming language, but my problem is that I don't know where to start ?!
I knew that it derived from the predicate logic, so am I supposed to learn about it before or what ?
up to this point, I tried to learn it from the documentation which comes with the visual prolog but, unfortunately, it is messy and the language seems to be mind-blowing to me !
so, anyone here can recommend me any suitable books or tutorials for it ?

posts.description: There's no longer any excuse to not use HTTPS. Simple to use, free, and automatically updated TLS/SSL certificates. Everyone with a web site needs to know about this. The time is now, let's encrypt the entire web!

posts.message:
Any network geeks here? 
I want to join multiple adsl lines to achieve higher upload speeds. 
What softwares/devices I can use to achieve this?

#laravel #route #htaccess #server

محتاج مساعده ياشباب فى نقطتين
الاولى :
عندى فولدر اسمه X
وعندى route اسمه X 
محتاج اخلى الاولوية على السيرفر  ل Route  ؟؟
اقصد الراوت الخاص بلارفل *
الثانية :
عندى ملف html
بداخل فولدر y
محتاج انى اعرضه عن طريق iframe  على نفس الموقع 
ولكن مش عاوزه يتعرض عن طريق الوصول المباشر لملف ال html

وشكرا مقدماً
